argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sb6x.1 | |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_sbh | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> ph ) |
| 3 |  | #P_biidd | |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ph ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_equsalh | |- ( A. x ( x = y -> ph ) <-> ph ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) |
\
 Equivalence involving substitution for a variable not free. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.)
